attributes.action: make colourblind by darius the christmas number one for 2020
attributes.additional_details: parliament have more power than me or the xfactor and its the only way it would get done. we dont need a christmas song with meaning this year. so i need the government to over rule and make darius number one.
attributes.background: i want them to make this song number one for christmas this year. i think this song can have many different meanings to people and has parts that relate to how things have turned out this year. i think more people will relate to this song this year than anything xfactor will release.

rejection.details: The UK Government is not responsible for compiling the music charts. These are compiled by the Official Charts Company. You can find out more about how the music charts are compiled here: https://www.officialcharts.com/getting-into-the-charts/how-the-charts-are-compiled/
